description: This Java source file 'Processor.java' serves as the main driver for a code generation framework. It processes a top-level XML configuration object 'ICService', parsing and creating internal representations of enums, POJOs, events, and messages. It manages cache initialization, analysis, and the code generation phases for different output languages (Java and native), utilizing various helper classes such as 'EnumProcessor', 'PojoProcessor', 'EventProcessor', and 'MessageProcessor'. It also handles reference resolution among variables and definitions, and controls the overall code generation workflow.

classes.name: Processor
classes.description: Main driver class for the code generation workflow; orchestrates parsing, analysis, and code generation processes based on XML configuration and language context.

methods.name: buildModel
methods.description: Parses the top-level ICService XML object and creates internal representations (enums, POJOs, events, messages).

methods.name: generateCode
methods.description: Performs code generation for POJOs, enums, events, and messages in specified languages based on context.

methods.name: getEnumProcessor
methods.description: Returns the EnumProcessor instance used for processing enums.

methods.name: getEventProcessor
methods.description: Returns the EventProcessor instance used for processing events.

methods.name: getPojoProcessor
methods.description: Returns the PojoProcessor instance used for processing POJOs.

methods.name: getMessageProcessor
methods.description: Returns the MessageProcessor instance used for processing messages.

methods.name: preparseVariables
methods.description: Initial parsing of variables, enums, POJOs, and events from the XML, building caches for reference resolution.

methods.name: getOrCreateVariable
methods.description: Returns an existing variable or creates a new one based on the XML bean.

methods.name: createVariable
methods.description: Creates a specific BaseVariable instance from an XML variable bean.

methods.name: parseEnumDefinition
methods.description: Creates and registers an EnumDefinition object from the XML definition.

methods.name: getVariableForName
methods.description: Retrieves a variable by its name.

methods.name: getCustomForName
methods.description: Retrieves a CustomVariable by its name if it exists.

methods.name: getAllEnumDefinitions
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all registered EnumDefinitions.

methods.name: clearCache
methods.description: Clears cached definitions and internal states to prepare for a new input.
